trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Fayetteville
There were no other sightings in Fayetteville on or around June 7th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving on Ramsey St towards Skibo Rd. Noticed bright stationary lights in the sky, thought it was a plane then radio tower until closer inspection. It stayed stationary for entirety of viewing. Couldn't stop looking at it until line of sight was broken by treeline. Then was no longer visible.
